intxt.ssousers: Note: The certificate will be issued to users who access {instance} via your state portal only

instn.t0052: Please enter description for this announcement (Max: 1200 chars)
instn.t0053: Enter web url (starting with http or https)
instn.t0054: Note: At least one of 'Description' or 'URL / weblink' or 'Attachment' must be provided.
instn.t0057: Please enter relevant title for this announcement (Max: 100 chars)
instn.t0002: You can add or upload details of up to 199 organizations at a time in one csv file
instn.t0007: The OrgName column is mandatory. Enter organization name in this column
instn.t0011: You can track progress with Process ID
instn.t0012: Save the Process ID for your future reference to track progress
instn.t0013: Download the csv file for reference
instn.t0021: Enter each organization's name in a separate row
instn.t0022: Entering details in all other columns is optional:
instn.t0023: isRootOrg: Valid values for this column True False
instn.t0024: channel: Unique ID provided during master organization creation
instn.t0025: externalId: Unique ID associated with each organization in the administrating  organizations repository
instn.t0026: provider: Channel ID of the administrator organization
instn.t0029: orgCode: Organizations unique code, if any,
instn.t0030: orgType: Type of organization, such as, NGO, primary school, secondary school etc
instn.t0031: preferredLanguage: Language preferences for the organization, if any
instn.t0032: contactDetail: Organizations mobile number and email address. Details should be entered within curly brackets in single quotes. For example: [{mobile number: 1234567890}]
instn.t0049: channel is mandatory if value for column isRootOrg is True
instn.t0050: externalId and provider are mutually mandatory
instn.t0062: You haven't created a batch for this course yet. Create a new batch and check the dashboard again.
instn.t0063: You have not created any course as yet. Create a new course and check the dashboard again.
instn.t0076: Note: All other columns in the CSV file are optional, for details on filling these, refer to
instn.t0078: locationId: An ID which identifies an announcement topic for a particular organisation
instn.t0079: locationCode: Comma separated list of location codes
instn.t0081: Thank you for registering on Nipun Lakshya App Chatbot. We have sent an sms OTP for verification. Verify your mobile number with the OTP to complete the registration process.
instn.t0082: Thank you for registering on Nipun Lakshya App Chatbot. We have sent an OTP to your registered email address for verification. Verify your email address with the OTP to complete the registration process.
instn.t0083: You will receive an SMS with the OTP for Mobile Number verification
instn.t0084: You will receive an email with the OTP to verify your email address
instn.t0085: The report shows data for the first 10,000 participants. Click download to view the progress of all the participants in the batch.
instn.t0098: File format for user list upload:
instn.t0099: Name * (Name of the user as per state records)
instn.t0100: Identifier * (Mobile number OR email address - either one of the two is mandatory)
instn.t0101: State * (The State that the user belongs to)
instn.t0102: Ext Org ID * (School ID as provided in Nipun Lakshya App Chatbot)
instn.t0103: Ext User ID * (State ID of the user)
instn.t0104: Input Status (Active, Inactive) * - Enter the record status as provided by the state administrator
instn.t0105: Roles (System roles to be assigned to the user)
instn.t0107: Use the **Download user details** button to download the self-declared teacher information from the portal. The data is updated every 24 hours
instn.t0108: Check that both, the phone number and State ID of each record in the downloaded file matches the corresponding State record. Update the STATUS column in the downloaded file. Valid Values for STATUS:n  a)VALIDATED: for records that match correctlyn b)REJECTED: for records that do not matchn c)ERROR: for records with missing information
instn.t0109: If the file has records that have STATUS = ERROR, add a new column ERROR TYPE
instn.t0110: For each record that has the STATUS = ERROR, you must add the appropriate error value in the ERROR TYPE column a)Valid values for ERROR TYPE:  a)ERROR-DISTRICT b)ERROR-PHONE c)ERROR-EMAIL d)ERROR-SCHOOL ORG NAME e)ERROR-SCHOOL ORG ID  f)ERROR-ID  g)ERROR-NAME
instn.t0112: Use the **Upload users csv** button to upload the file
instn.t0067: Provide the details below for suggesting content that is relevant for you
instn.t0090: Copy {instance} files (eg. Maths_01.ecar) from your pen drive to My Library to play them offline
instn.t0091: Click My Library to access all your offline content
instn.t0092: Download content when you are online from {instance} to My Library
instn.t0093: Watch detailed videos to understand how to use the {instance} desktop app
instn.t0094: How do I load content to the {instance} desktop app?
instn.t0095: How do I download content from {instance} Library?
instn.t0096: My Downloads: How do I play content?
instn.t0097: How do I copy content to my pen drive?
